content.text: Match ends, Granada CF 5, Xerez 0.
Second Half ends, Granada CF 5, Xerez 0.
Goal!  Granada CF 5, Xerez 0. Juan José Collantes (Granada CF) right footed shot from outside the box to the top left corner. Assisted by Carlos Calvo.
Corner,  Xerez. Conceded by Rubén Párraga.
Allan Nyom (Granada CF) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Mario Bermejo (Xerez).
Attempt blocked. Capdevila (Xerez) left footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Raúl Llorente.
Attempt missed. Juan José Collantes (Granada CF) right footed shot from the right side of the box is too high.
Offside, Xerez. Capdevila tries a through ball, but Mario Bermejo is caught offside.
Substitution, Granada CF. Luis Muriel replaces Alexandre Geijo.
Corner,  Granada CF. Conceded by Lledó.
Attempt saved. Jonathan Mensah (Granada CF) right footed shot from the right side of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Mikel Rico.
Corner,  Granada CF. Conceded by David Lombán.
Mario Bermejo (Xerez) is shown the yellow card for a bad foul.

Penalty saved! Mario Bermejo (Xerez) fails to capitalise on this great opportunity,  right footed shot saved  in the bottom left corner.
Rubén Párraga (Granada CF) is shown the yellow card for hand ball.
